prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: a young man with ordinary yet gentle appearance, standing full-body in the center of a pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes, his face is softly defined with delicate features, including warm expressive eyes that hold a hint of melancholy and introspection, a straight nose, and tender lips slightly curved in a thoughtful, compassionate expression, his skin has a fair, luminous quality, his hair is medium-length, slightly wavy, in a soft chestnut brown color, styled casually with strands gently framing his face, he wears elegant, timeless clothing fitting the ethereal world of "时光之庭": a loose white linen shirt with delicate embroidery along the collar and cuffs in silver thread, over dark taupe trousers of soft wool, a long, lightweight cloak in muted shades of lavender and dusk blue drapes from his shoulders, its fabric seeming to shimmer with a subtle iridescence like memory, around his neck hangs a simple pendant—a crystal vial containing swirling gold and silver particles ("永恒之沙"), his posture is calm yet slightly weary, embodying his "情感共鸣" ability, with faint starlight particles glowing softly around his hands and a gentle, sorrowful aura that matches the game's beautiful, poignant tone, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
